title: Deerclops Eyeball
summaries: The Deerclops Eyeball is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Tiny Deerclops to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, Tiny Deerclops flies while holding onto a bird to catch up with them. The Deerclops Eyeball has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped from Deerclops in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a tiny Deerclops
'You lookin' at me? Are YOU lookin' at ME?'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
